description: This service facilitates the download of Aadhaar XML documents from Digilocker using a session token. It ensures secure and compliant retrieval of Aadhaar data for onboarding workflows.
llm_summary: Digilocker Aadhaar (Document Download) enables secure Aadhaar XML retrieval using a session token. It supports compliant onboarding workflows and ensures data security.
use_cases: Download Aadhaar XML documents for KYC and compliance workflows.
Facilitate secure Aadhaar data retrieval using Digilocker session tokens.
Ensure compliant onboarding processes with Aadhaar document verification.
Support seamless integration of Aadhaar document download in front-end applications.
Enable secure and efficient Aadhaar data handling for regulatory reporting.

request_schema.description: Session token for Digilocker document download
User consent for downloading Aadhaar XML document
